export-app.html.source: <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head>     <title>{{name}}</title>     <meta charset="UTF-8">     <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> </head> <body>     <!-- SyrupJS -->     <script>     {{library}}     </script>     <!-- System -->     <script>     syrup.on('ready', function () {         var systemId = syrup.require('db').system({{system}});          var system = syrup.require(systemId);         system.main();     });     </script> </body> </html>
